text: Manu Snellinx (born 23 August 1948) is a former Belgian cyclist. He competed in the sprint and tandem events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Belgium Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Belgium) Category:People from Bilzen
title: Manu Snellinx
